ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Shall we speak?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well while we are speaking, I plan to scale down my character load. I plan to keep Legacy, Cyclonus, Scourge, and Marauder. I will NPC Rodimus to keep a story

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Well while we are speaking, 

I plan to scale down my character load. I plan to keep Legacy, Cyclonus, Scourge, and Marauder. I will NPC Rodimus to keep a story Arc Airly wants to run and NPC Skorpy until the end of this one. Lord Elder will most likely just stay at the Ark unless someone NEEDS him. I hope to keep at least one character on each of the three major factions (Bot/Max, Con/Pred, and Unicron).

Does anyone have any story arcs, or things they would like to see happen that I can help with OOCly or ICly? If so feel free to send to me on or off list. 

While I am generally available for a little while each day, that will eventually slow as RL issuses mount. But I will do my best to keep up and alert others as things happen. 

Preston


      
--0-377037305-1221599942=:63482
